column17:
Product Description

Rasasi Blue for Men is the first fragrance for men by Rasasi and matches the spirit of the very successful Blue Lady product. Rasasi Perfume Blue for Men is bottled in frosted blue glass similar to the concept of Blue Lady product. The solid and smooth angles of the Rasasi Blue for Men bottle shape and a silver metallic cap in the shape of a hat portray the traits of a gentleman. The box is in a complementary combination of blue and silver colors and the main feature is the design of a hat. The branding is in blue on the silver background. A perfect match for our Blue Lady --- Blue for men.
